deathtouch.desc: Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.

doublestrike.desc: This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.

enchant.desc: This card can only be attached to an %0.

equip.desc: %0: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.

firststrike.desc: This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.

flash.desc: You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.

flying.desc: This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying and/or reach.

haste.desc: This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.

hexproof.desc: This permanent can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.

indestructible.desc: Effects that say "destroy" donâ€™t destroy this.

lifelink.desc: Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.

menace.desc: This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.

prowess.desc: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

reach.desc: This creature can block creatures with flying.

trample.desc: This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.

vigilance.desc: Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.
